content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-5.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting various components at positions (-5.5, 16.5) and (-8.5, 23.5)
- Multiple Small Electric Poles at positions (-8.5, 17.5), (-8.5, 16.5), (-6.5, 16.5), (-1.5, 16.5), (0.5, 16.5), (0.5, 21.5), (0.5, 24.5), and (-5.5, 25.5)

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient materials
- Ensure that you have all the necessary materials in your inventory before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when placing entities over water
- Avoid placing entities on water tiles. Check the terrain before placing to ensure the entity footprint does not overlap with water.

### Errors due to unconnected electric networks
- Make sure all components that require electricity are connected to the electric network. Check connections between poles and ensure they are properly linked to the power source.

### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that boilers and other fuel-dependent entities have the necessary fuel to operate. Keep track of fuel levels and replenish them as needed.
